cards.name: Law of the Stormcore
cards.description: 1d8 + INT lightning; on hit chain a free 1d4 bolt to a second target; if Momentum ≥ 2, that bolt deals 1d6 instead

cards.name: Aegis Rebind
cards.description: Gain temp HP equal to 1d6 + CON; if Shielded, also reflect 1d4 to the next attacker

cards.name: Gleam Strike (Tier I)
cards.description: Cost: 1 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 1; Effect: 1d4 + WIS radiant at Near range; if you have Radiance ≥ 1, gain +1 Momentum on hit

cards.name: Oathbound Guard (Tier I)
cards.description: Cost: 1 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 1; Effect: Reduce dmg by 1d4; grant +1 Defense until next turn; gain +1 Momentum when dmg is reduced

cards.name: Hymn of Embers (Tier I)
cards.description: Cost: 1 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 1; Effect: Next ally attack deals +1 radiant; gain 1 Radiance; gain +1 Momentum when Radiance is gained

cards.name: Searing Canticle (Tier II)
cards.description: Cost: 2 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 2; Effect: 1d6 + WIS radiant; +1 dmg if target harmed an ally last round; if that condition is met, gain +1 Momentum

cards.name: Sanctus Aegis (Tier II)
cards.description: Cost: 2 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 2; Effect: Reduce dmg by 1d6; you and a Near ally gain +1 IDF; you and that ally each gain +1 Momentum

cards.name: Chorus of Resolve (Tier II)
cards.description: Cost: 2 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 2; Effect: Ally gains 1 RP and +1 Attack; remove Exhausted; that ally gains +1 Momentum

cards.name: Judgment Lance (Tier III)
cards.description: Cost: 3 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 3; Effect: 1d8 + WIS radiant; if Radiance ≥ 1, deal +2 dmg and consume 1 Radiance; if Momentum ≥ 2, deal +2 additional dmg (total +4)

cards.name: Warding Reprisal (Tier III)
cards.description: Cost: 3 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 3; Effect: Reduce dmg by 1d8; attacker takes radiant dmg equal to Radiance; if Momentum ≥ 2, attacker instead takes radiant dmg equal to 2Ã— your Radiance

cards.name: Radiant Burst (Tier III, Signature)
cards.description: Cost: 3 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 3; Effect: Consume all Radiance: primary target takes 1d8 + WIS + 2/stack; others take 1/stack; if Momentum ≥ 2, others take 2/stack instead

cards.name: Cutpoint Slice (Tier I)
cards.description: Cost: 1 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 1; Effect: 1d4 + DEX; apply Bleed 1; if target was already Bleeding, gain +1 Momentum

cards.name: Veil Step (Tier I)
cards.description: Cost: 1 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 1; Effect: Reduce dmg by 1d4; if avoided, apply Bleed 1 to attacker and gain +1 Momentum

cards.name: Wound Mark (Tier I)
cards.description: Cost: 1 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 1; Effect: Your next Bleed application gains +1 Bleed; gain +1 Momentum when that enhanced Bleed is applied

cards.name: Artery Rupture (Tier II)
cards.description: Cost: 2 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 2; Effect: 1d6 + DEX; apply Bleed 2; if target is already Bleeding, also apply Stagger 1; gain up to +2 Momentum based on Bleed stacks applied

cards.name: Veinshift Evade (Tier II)
cards.description: Cost: 2 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 2; Effect: Reduce dmg by 1d6; if avoided, become Invisible; next attack applies +1 Bleed; if this was a Perfect Dodge, gain +2 Momentum

cards.name: Bloodletting Focus (Tier II)
cards.description: Cost: 2 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 2; Effect: Your next two Bleed applications each gain +1 Bleed; gain +1 Momentum immediately

cards.name: Hemorrhage Breaker (Tier III)
cards.description: Cost: 3 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 3; Effect: 1d8 + DEX; if Bleed ≥ 3, deal +4 dmg and consume stacks for +1 dmg/stack; if Momentum ≥ 2, each consumed stack instead grants +2 dmg

cards.name: Bloodfade Veil (Tier III)
cards.description: Cost: 3 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 3; Effect: Reduce dmg by 1d8; become Invisible; next attack deals +2 dmg per Bleed on target; if Momentum ≥ 2, that attack deals +3 dmg per Bleed instead

cards.name: Crimson Dictate (Tier III, Signature)
cards.description: Cost: 3 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 3; Effect: All Bleeding enemies gain +2 Bleed; your next Bleed spreads to a second target; if Momentum ≥ 2, it spreads to a third target as well

cards.name: Charge Bolt (Tier I)
cards.description: Cost: 1 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 1; Effect: 1d4 + INT lightning; +1 dmg if you spent RP last action; if you spent RP last action, also gain +1 Momentum

cards.name: Warding Pulse (Tier I)
cards.description: Cost: 1 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 1; Effect: Reduce dmg by 1d4; attacker takes 1 lightning dmg; if dmg is reduced to 0, gain +1 Momentum

cards.name: Arcane Channel (Tier I)
cards.description: Cost: 1 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 1; Effect: Next spell gains +1 to hit; gain +1 RP; gain +1 Momentum

cards.name: Surge Lance (Tier II)
cards.description: Cost: 2 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 2; Effect: 1d6 + INT lightning; on hit gain Arcane Charge (+1 dmg next spell); gain +1 Momentum

cards.name: Feedback Shield (Tier II)
cards.description: Cost: 2 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 2; Effect: Reduce dmg by 1d6; if reduced to 0, attacker takes INT dmg; gain +1 Momentum

cards.name: Conduit Flow (Tier II)
cards.description: Cost: 2 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 2; Effect: +1 INT for 1 round; next spell gains +2 dmg; gain +1 Momentum

cards.name: Aetheric Reversal (Tier III)
cards.description: Cost: 3 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 3; Effect: Reduce dmg by 1d8; attacker becomes Disrupted (−2 to spell rolls); if Momentum ≥ 2, Disrupted becomes −3

cards.name: Arcanum Overload (Tier III, Signature)
cards.description: Cost: 3 (Martial Pool); Cooldown: 3; Effect: Next spell has Advantage and +3 dmg; you take 1 self‑damage; if Momentum ≥ 2, that bonus becomes +5
